text: @SpeakerPelosi Well, old girl, if anyone knows about falsehoods and how to spread it...you would know!! You’re a sleaze leading the pack with lies against POTUS Trump...even accusing him of murder by Covid19.Your media outlet puppets won’t be around to cover your lies when you stand before God.
